sx.blah.discord.api

Class ClientBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • sx.blah.discord.api.ClientBuilder

  • public class ClientBuilder
extends Object
    Use this as a factory to create IDiscordClient instances

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ClientBuilder() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IDiscordClient build()
      Creates the discord instance with the desired features
      String getToken()
      Gets the provided token.
      IDiscordClient login()
      Performs build() and logs in automatically
      ClientBuilder setDaemon(boolean isDaemon)
      Sets whether the client should act as a daemon (it is NOT a daemon by default).
      ClientBuilder setMaxReconnectAttempts(int maxReconnectAttempts)
      Sets the max amount of attempts shards managed by this client will make to reconnect in the event of an unexpected disconnection.
      ClientBuilder withPingTimeout(int maxMissedPings)
      Makes the client have a ping timeout.
      ClientBuilder withShards(int shardCount)
      Sets the sharding information for the client.
      ClientBuilder withToken(String token)
      Provides the login info for the client.

    • Method Detail

      • withToken

        public ClientBuilder withToken(String token)
        Provides the login info for the client.
        Parameters:
        token - The bot's token.
        Returns:
        The instance of the builder.

      • getToken

        public String getToken()
        Gets the provided token.
        Returns:
        The provided token.

      • withPingTimeout

        public ClientBuilder withPingTimeout(int maxMissedPings)
        Makes the client have a ping timeout.
        Parameters:
        maxMissedPings - The maximum amount of pings that discord can not respond to before a new session is created.
        Returns:
        The instance of the builder.

      • setDaemon

        public ClientBuilder setDaemon(boolean isDaemon)
        Sets whether the client should act as a daemon (it is NOT a daemon by default).
        Parameters:
        isDaemon - If true, the client will not stop the JVM from closing until the client is logged out from. If false the client will stop the JVM from closing until logged out from.
        Returns:
        The instance of the builder.

      • withShards

        public ClientBuilder withShards(int shardCount)
        Sets the sharding information for the client.
        Parameters:
        shardCount - The total number of shards that will be created.
        Returns:
        The instance of the builder.

      • setMaxReconnectAttempts

        public ClientBuilder setMaxReconnectAttempts(int maxReconnectAttempts)
        Sets the max amount of attempts shards managed by this client will make to reconnect in the event of an unexpected disconnection.
        Parameters:
        maxReconnectAttempts - The max amount of attempts before the shard is abandoned.
        Returns:
        The instance of the builder.

      • build

        public IDiscordClient build()
                     throws DiscordException
        Creates the discord instance with the desired features
        Returns:
        The discord instance
        Throws:
        DiscordException - Thrown if the instance isn't built correctly

      • login

        public IDiscordClient login()
                     throws DiscordException
        Performs build() and logs in automatically
        Returns:
        The discord instance
        Throws:
        DiscordException - Thrown if the instance isn't built correctly
